meanings.definition: To consume too much of something.
meanings.sent1: It is not good to overconsume sugary treats.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overconsume snacks when she is stressed.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overconsumed on popcorn at the movies and felt sick.
meanings.sent4: The engine overconsumed fuel, causing it to run out sooner than expected.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overconsume energy to save resources for the future.

meanings.definition: To eat or drink more than necessary.
meanings.sent1: Remember not to overconsume soda, as it is not good for your health.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overconsume water during his workouts.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly overconsumed on birthday cake and regretted it later.
meanings.sent4: The car overconsumed gasoline on the long road trip.
meanings.sent5: It's important not to overconsume junk food for a balanced diet.

meanings.definition: To use or buy more than is needed.
meanings.sent1: Try not to overconsume paper towels to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: They tend to overconsume clothes during sales.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overconsumed on office supplies and had to return some.
meanings.sent4: The company overconsumed resources, leading to budget issues.
meanings.sent5: It's better not to overconsume products to save money and space.
